flags.text: This project guide has low-quality images. Pictures need to be either re-edited or re-taken.

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This was a part of the Bridgeton, MO LED billboard on I-70. During the Good Friday tornado this section flew almost a half mile and landed next to my sisters house.
guide.introduction_rendered: This was a part of the Bridgeton, MO LED billboard on I-70. During the Good Friday tornado this section flew almost a half mile and landed next to my sisters house.

lines.text: I found this board face down in the mud after the storm.  As soon as I picked it up I knew it was part of the now destroyed LED billboard down the highway.
lines.text_raw: I found this board face down in the mud after the storm.  As soon as I picked it up I knew it was part of the now destroyed LED billboard down the highway.

guide.summary: I will attempt to get this billboard panel back into working order and hang it up in my home.
guide.title: Reviving a LED Panel
